name: Super Golf Odyssey
description:
Golf but you are the Ball! 

What do the balls feel when you hit them with a golf club? Where do they fly away? What the meaning of live? Find out in this non-accurate golf ball simulator!

Freatures:
  • 3 levels to play
  • Tons of coins to collect
  • Most realistic bush hiding
  • Please big N, do not sue me!
Made by Alex Grade (Youtube / Twitter) Assets used:

Cart
Club
Ball
Flag
Bush
Mushroom
Beach props

Music by Phillip Schlosser [HephestosMusic]

1-1
1-2
1-3
Menu - smw&chill

System requirements
  • Do not own a Nintendo console
  • Windows 7,8,10 or later
  • Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • 4 GB RAM
